channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: AMCネットワークス第2四半期：純収入は前年同期比8％減の6億7800万ドル、調整後営業利益は同9.6％減の1億7600万ドル、ストリーミング契約者数は第1四半期から50万人減の1100万人（Jennifer Maas/Variety）
item.description:
Jennifer Maas / Variety:
AMC Networks Q2: net revenue fell 8% YoY to $678M and adjusted operating income fell 9.6% YoY to $176M; streaming subscribers fell 500K from Q1 to 11M  —  AMC Networks reported its second-quarter 2023 earnings Friday, revealing it had lost 500,000 more subscribers across its portfolio …

item.title: WGAは本日、5月のストライキ以来初めてAMPTPと会談し、契約交渉再開の可否について話し合う（Dawn Chmielewski/Reuters）
item.description:
Dawn Chmielewski / Reuters:
The WGA is meeting with the AMPTP today for the first time since the strike was called in May to discuss whether contract talks can resume  —  As the Hollywood writers' strike approaches the 100-day mark, Writers Guild of America (WGA) negotiators will meet on Friday with representatives …

item.title: 情報筋：プライベート・エクイティ会社KKRが、パラマウント・グローバルからサイモン＆シュスター社を約16億5000万ドルで買収する交渉を進めている（ウォール・ストリート・ジャーナル紙）
item.description:
Wall Street Journal:
Sources: private equity firm KKR is in advanced talks to acquire Simon & Schuster from Paramount Global for around $1.65B  —  Book publisher was put up for sale for the second time after a judge blocked a previous deal with Penguin Random House  —  Private-equity firm KKR is in advanced talks …

item.title: NPR傘下の公共ラジオ局上位20局の2022年の週平均総リスナー数は前年比10％減の約800万人、NPRの収入は前年比8％増の3億1670万ドル（ピュー・リサーチ・センター）。
item.description:
Pew Research Center:
The top 20 NPR-affiliated public radio stations had an average total weekly listenership of ~8M in 2022, down 10% YoY; NPR revenue grew 8% YoY to $316.7M  —  Table of Contents  —  Hundreds of local and regional radio and television stations make up the U.S. public media system.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAのストライキにおける重要な争点のひとつである、デジタル肖像権の管理不足への懸念を語る背景俳優たち（Bobby Allyn/NPR）
item.description:
Bobby Allyn / NPR:
Background actors describe their worries over lack of control of their digital likenesses, which is one key issue in the SAG-AFTRA strike  —  After four weeks of working as a background actor on the Disney+ series WandaVision during the pandemic, Alexandria Rubalcaba was told by the production crew to report to a tractor trailer.

item.title: フォックス・ニュースの法的問題を理由にFCCに免許更新の阻止を求める団体がある中、フォックス社はフィラデルフィアのテレビ局の免許更新を擁護している（マシュー・キーズ／デスク）
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Fox Corp defends its effort to renew the license of a Philadelphia TV station, as a group asks the FCC to block renewal due to the legal issues at Fox News  —  Through its attorney, the broadcaster says whatever was aired on the Fox News Channel has nothing to do with the Philadelphia TV station.

item.title: SAG-AFTRAのフラン・ドレッシャー会長は、ハリウッドによるAIの悪用は「致命的なカクテル」であり、厳格な規制が必要な「毒」だと述べている（David Robb/Deadline）
item.description:
David Robb / Deadline:
SAG-AFTRA President Fran Drescher says Hollywood's potential misuse of AI is a “deadly cocktail” and a “poison” that needs to be strictly regulated  —  Hollywood's potential misuse of artificial intelligence is a “deadly cocktail” and a “poison” that needs to be strictly regulated …

item.title: テキサスA&M、黒人ジャーナリストKathleen McElroy氏への100万ドルの支払いに合意。
item.description:
Janet Lorin / Bloomberg:
Texas A&M agrees to pay Black journalist Kathleen McElroy $1M to settle legal claims over her botched hiring; the case led to the resignation of A&M's president  —  Texas A&M University agreed to pay a prominent Black professor $1 million in a settlement over her failed hiring that led …

item.title: ガネット、第2四半期は1270万ドルの純損失（前年同期は5400万ドルの損失）、通期売上高予想は1000万ドルの損失から2000万ドルの利益に調整、株価は13％以上上昇（Angela Fu/Poynter
item.description:
Angela Fu / Poynter:
Gannett reports a Q2 net loss of $12.7M, vs. $54M loss in Q2 2022, adjusts full-year revenue estimates to between $10M loss and $20M profit; stock is up 13%+  —  Both Gannett and Lee Enterprises reported digital growth in the most recent quarter as total revenue fell.

item.title: アップル、Apple TV+やApple Musicを含むサービス部門の第3四半期売上高は前年同期比8.2%増の212億ドルと過去最高を記録、1B以上の有料契約が牽引（Todd Spangler/Variety）
item.description:
Todd Spangler / Variety:
Apple reports Q3 revenue for its Services segment, which includes Apple TV+ and Apple Music, grew 8.2% YoY to a record $21.2B, driven by 1B+ paid subscriptions  —  Apple delivered solid financial results for the June 2023 quarter that beat Wall Street estimates, even as top-line revenue dipped 1.4% on lower-than-expected iPhone sales.

item.title: アマゾン第2四半期：広告収入は前年同期比22％増の106.8億ドル（予想104億ドル）、サブスクリプション収入は前年同期比14％増の98.9億ドル、北米セグメントの売上高は前年同期比11％増の825億ドル（Annie Palmer/CNBC
item.description:
Annie Palmer / CNBC:
Amazon Q2: ad revenue up 22% YoY to $10.68B, vs. $10.4B est., subscription revenue up 14% YoY to $9.89B, and North America segment sales up 11% YoY to $82.5B  —  - Amazon beat on the top and bottom lines for the second quarter.  —  Amazon said second-quarter revenue climbed 11% …

item.title: 英国における違法なライブストリーミングは減少し、昨シーズンは60万件以上がブロックされた。
item.description:
Martyn Ziegler / The Times:
A look at Premier League soccer's fight against piracy as illegal live streams in the UK decline, with 600K+ blocked last season, and use of IPTV devices rises  —  With broadcasters losing billions of pounds a year to tech-savvy criminal networks, new weapons are needed in the war against an “industry killer”

item.title: MailOnlineがダン・ウートンの週2回のコラム執筆を一時停止。
item.description:
Jim Waterson / The Guardian:
MailOnline suspends Dan Wootton from writing his twice-weekly column; he continues to present a nightly primetime show on GB News  —  Journalist denies claims he used pseudonym to secretly offer colleagues tens of thousands of pounds for sexual material  —  Dan Wootton has been suspended …

item.title: GBニュースのダン・ウートンと、性的資料を共有するために男性を買収し、嫌がらせをした2人のオンライン・ペルソナが、データ流出ディレクトリから見つかったユニークなパスワードでつながっている（Byline Times）。
item.description:
Byline Times:
A unique password found in a data breach directory links GB News' Dan Wootton to two online personas that bribed and harassed men to share sexual material  —  Receive our Behind the Headlines email and we'll post a free copy of Byline Times  —  GB News star Dan Wootton twice used …

item.title: Triller、2021年の$5B SPAC合併と2022年の直接上場を破棄してNYSE IPOを申請、2022年の売上は$47.7M、損失は$195.6M（Amanda Silberling/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Amanda Silberling / TechCrunch:
Triller files for a NYSE IPO after scrapping a $5B SPAC merger in 2021 and a direct listing in 2022; Triller had $47.7M in revenue and a $195.6M loss in 2022  —  Triller has long teased its ambitions to go public, and now, the short form video platform seems to on its way to an IPO.
